ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda

Class RdaCloudlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Cloudlet
      • ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.RdaCloudlet

  • public class RdaCloudlet
extends org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Cloudlet
    This Cloudlet works in a progress aware way. This means that it requests computing resources, dependent on the already progressed workload. This behavior becomes visible, as soon as there is a time of scarcity and it didn't get all requested resources. This is resulting into a down-graded processing speed. Naturally, this is also reflected in the overall processing time of the Cloudlet that will increase.
    It must be instantiated with a CSV input file that contains the requested resources for cpu, ram, bandwidth & storage I/O.
    Example CSV file:
    cpu,ram,network,storage 150,50,0,0
    280,300,0,0
    cpu in MIPS (million instructions per second)
    ram in MB
    network in MB/s
    storage in MB/s

    The fist line of the input values represents the requested values at 0 second, second line 1 second and so on.
    Author:
    Patrick A. Taddei
    See Also:
    RdaCloudletSchedulerDynamicWorkload

    • Constructor Detail

      • RdaCloudlet

        public RdaCloudlet(int cloudletId,
           int pesNumber,
           long cloudletFileSize,
           long cloudletOutputSize,
           String inputPath,
           boolean record)
            throws FileNotFoundException,
                   UnsupportedEncodingException
        Instantiates the Cloudlet.
        Parameters:
        cloudletId - the unique ID of this Cloudlet
        cloudletFileSize - the file size (in byte) of this cloudlet BEFORE submitting to a PowerDatacenter
        cloudletOutputSize - the file size (in byte) of this cloudlet AFTER finish executing by a PowerDatacenter
        inputPath - The path to the CSV file.
        record - True, if the output should be written into a CSV file. (File name is: yyyyMMddhhmmssSSS.csv)
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        UnsupportedEncodingException

      • RdaCloudlet

        public RdaCloudlet(int cloudletId,
           int pesNumber,
           long cloudletFileSize,
           long cloudletOutputSize,
           ArrayList<double[]> inputData,
           boolean record)
            throws FileNotFoundException,
                   UnsupportedEncodingException
        Instantiates the Cloudlet.
        Parameters:
        cloudletId - the unique ID of this Cloudlet
        cloudletFileSize - the file size (in byte) of this cloudlet BEFORE submitting to a PowerDatacenter
        cloudletOutputSize - the file size (in byte) of this cloudlet AFTER finish executing by a PowerDatacenter
        inputData - The input utilization data of the cloudlet.
        record - True, if the output should be written into a CSV file. (File name is: yyyyMMddhhmmssSSS.csv)
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        UnsupportedEncodingException

      • getEstimatedNextChangeTime

        public double getEstimatedNextChangeTime()
        Assesses the current progress of the cloudlet and computes the time to the next consumption change. This corresponds the given input values. Generally, a consumption change might be a change of the gradient.
        Returns:
        The estimated time when there is a consumption change.
